item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

i added about 80% prayer to my server and when your pray gets low i was thinking of adding an alter. but i dont know how. i was thinking something along the lines of grabbing the xp for their prayer then convert into there lvl.
this is what ive come up with

case 61:
{
playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
levelup(5);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("You recharge your prayer points");
setAnimation(811);
stillgfx(76, absY, absX);
}
break;
